name: What's your emergency
description:
What's your emergency it's single player story game where you take the boots of a 911 operator.

The story takes place on the fictional city of New Yaka where crime rates are sky high due to poor management of the city's mayor.

During the game you will be presented with different emergency situations, your job is to help those people in need sending the correct emergency department, to do that you will gather information talking with the victim and once you have enough information you'll be able to send aid using the new computer application called "Emergency_Manager_2.0" in wich you will be able to choose which emergency department to send to the rescue. Be carefould with your choices tho becasue a wrong decision could make the difference between life and death.

Every day that passes you will recive new orders that you must fulfill in order not to be fired, making your job more and more difficult as it progresses, the first of it beeing daily task you must complete every day.

Not only this, but your position has caught the attention of various factions in the city and they will try to "persuade" you to help them in their interests. Will you be a good operator and save everyone? Or maybe you will help some faction take control of the city?
